about_the_game:
Take up quick battles against your friends in groups of 4 up to 20 people, in this sometimes chaotic but very strategic team-versus-team capture-the-flag game.
In Outranked, each player gets one of their team's ranks, and has to capture the opposing team's flag and bring it back to their own team's base.
When you encounter an opponent, you can choose to attack them, revealing your ranks to each other. The player with the highest rank wins and strips the other player of their rank. But don't think the highest rank is invulnerable: some ranks have special abilities...
detailed_description:
Take up quick battles against your friends in groups of 4 up to 20 people, in this sometimes chaotic but very strategic team-versus-team capture-the-flag game.
In Outranked, each player gets one of their team's ranks, and has to capture the opposing team's flag and bring it back to their own team's base.
When you encounter an opponent, you can choose to attack them, revealing your ranks to each other. The player with the highest rank wins and strips the other player of their rank. But don't think the highest rank is invulnerable: some ranks have special abilities...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / 18.04
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound not required to play
  • Additional Notes: Vivox Voice Chat

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel/AMD GPU
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound not required to play
  • Additional Notes: Headset with microphone is needed for voice chat
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or Apple M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Surround Sound or 3D capable headphones
  • Additional Notes: Headset with microphone for voice chat

name: Outranked

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or higher
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound not required to play
  • Additional Notes: Headset with microphone is needed for voice chat
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or AMD RX5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Surround Sound or 3D capable headphones
  • Additional Notes: Headset with microphone for voice chat

short_description: Take up quick battles against your friends in groups of 4 up to 20 people, in this sometimes chaotic but very strategic team-versus-team capture-the-flag game. In Outranked, each player gets one of their team's ranks, to capture the opposing team's flag and bring it back to their own team's base.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
